description: Criticising the NDA government on Saturday, Rahul Gandhi said that while there is a pressing situation of drought and farmer suicide in the country, Narendra Modi's government is busy celebrating with songs and dance.
title: Govt busy celebrating during drought: Rahul Gandhi

description: The All India Muslim Personal Law Board (AIMPLB) on Friday fielded its women members to reject the growing demand of women organisations for scrapping of the provision of 'triple talaq' and the organisation slammed the move as a conspiracy to impose a uniform civil code (UCC).
title: AIMPLB against ban on triple talaq

description: Kapil Sibal, who is being fielded as the Congress' candidate for the Rajya Sabha seat from Uttar Pradesh, will require winning over "small parties" to gather enough votes to be elected to the house. The Congress, which would require 36 votes in the 403-member house, only has 29 members.
title: Congress fields Kapil Sibal for Rajya Sabha from UP

description: "Lalu favoured Jethmalani for two reasons. First, he is a BJP basher after his expulsion from the BJP in 2013 and second, he has been helping the RJD leader in the multi-crore fodder scam cases," a Rashtriya Janata Dal leader said.
title: Lalu Yadav picks daughter, Jethmalani for Rajya Sabha seats

description: ​Seeking to globalize compassion, Nobel laureate Kailash Satyarthi plans to launch a major initiative that will enlist support of other Nobel prize winners and world leaders for the cause of neglected and abused children.​
title: Satyarthi plans global campaign for child rights

description: Two militants were gunned down in a late night operation by the security forces in Srinagar, and one of the slain militants has been identified as Saifullah, a Pakistani national who was commander of Jamait-ul-Mujahideen.
title: Top JeM commander killed in Srinagar encounter

description: Prakash Singh, head of the committee that submitted a report on the violence during the Jat quota agitation, has claimed that attempts were made by some people to influence him during its preparation. Singh, without naming anyone, said he was influenced to issue a "clean chit" to some wrongdoers.
title: Jat stir panel head coerced to give clean chit

description: President Pranab Mukherjee on Tuesday embarked on a four-day visit to China with an aim to bolster economic ties between the two countries and seek cooperation for combating designs of terror groups.
title: Counter-terrorism, NPT on President's China visit agenda

description: On the day of the Modi government's second anniversary celebrations, senior Congress leader Anil K Shastri has alleged that the BJP-led NDA government's achievements are a lie and it has not fulfilled any of its promises in two years of its rule.
title: Modi government is a total failure: Congress

description: Sarbananda Sonowal, who led the BJP party to its maiden victory in the crucial North eastern state, said sealing the Indo-Bangla border to check illegal infiltration will be top priority of his government in Assam.
title: Will seal Indo-Bangladesh border: Sonowal

description: Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu has said that the ministry is working on revamping the railways' operation and will ensure that the public transporter becomes an engine of growth in the forthcoming years.
title: Trying to take railways out of ICU: Prabhu

description: Over 300 AAP supporters and some party leaders were detained on Saturday as they took out a protest march towards the residence of Prime Minister Narendra Modi alleging a BJP-Congress alliance in corruption.
title: Over 300 detained in AAP rallies

description: NIT Srinagar has constituted a students' grievance redressal committee, which will include two external members, to go into the incidents that led to tension on the campus and submit its report on May 15.
title: NIT Srinagar forms panel to probe incidents on campus

description: Bihar CM Nitish Kumar attacked the Jharkhand government for setting up liquor shops near the Bihar-Jharkhand border after the liquor ban came in force in Bihar. Nitish said that this ban was the demand of 50 percent of population (women) and no one can stop it now.
title: Nitish Kumar kickstarts anti-liquor campaign in Jharkhand

description: The organisers of 4 day conference on Freedom, Justice and Equality in Dharamshala, where dissidents from China’s ethnic and religious minorities, are meeting have left out Tibetan muslims, living in Kashmir.
title: No Kashmiri Tibetan Muslims at Dharamshala conference

description: Deputy chief minister Sukhbir Badal on Saturday got a major relief when a Faridkot court acquitted him in a decade-old case related to poll violence in 1999.
title: 17 years on, Sukhbir acquitted of violence during canvassing

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday launched a barrage of verbal volleys, calling Mamata Banerjee a back-stabber and accusing Trinamool Congress of turning the state into a graveyard.
title: Left did Bengal's barbadi, Mamata caused tabahi: PM

description: Piyush Goyal slamming Tamil Nadu chief minister Jayalalithaa's inaccessibility and lack of response to queries on power situation has gone viral on social media.
title: Karuna uses Piyush’s video to target ‘inaccessible’ Amma

description: In a veiled reference to truant liquor baron Vijay Mallya, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday said his government had tightened the screws on bank defaulters and that no one would be spared if there is any attempt to defraud financial institutions.
title: No bank defaulter will be spared: PM

description: Telangana home minister Nayani Narasimha Reddy has pronounced Rohith Vemula a non-Dalit, saying the deceased student belonged to the Vadera caste, but the Telangana police said the matter was still under investigation.
title: Rohith Vemula a non-Dalit: Telangana mantri
